Class RawLoggingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
      • edu.msu.nscl.olog.api.RawLoggingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.sun.jersey.api.client.ClientHandler

    public class RawLoggingFilter
extends com.sun.jersey.api.client.filter.ClientFilter
    A Raw HTML request/response logging filter. added level check to the handle.
    Author:
    Paul.Sandoz@Sun.Com, shroffk
